round_best: Develop a deep learning framework that integrates physics-based noise models specific to EMCCDs with a generative adversarial network (GAN) approach for image denoising. This model would be trained on a dataset of low-light images from EMCCDs, using simulated noisy images informed by the physics of electron multiplication and charge transfer inefficiencies. The adversarial training between the noise modeling generator and the denoising discriminator would allow the system to adaptively enhance image quality by learning the peculiarities of noise patterns across different EMCCD settings and applications, leading to more accurate conclusions in scientific experiments.
